00029   class ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor : public marlin::Processor {
00030

00033     //  Abbreviation for the map type used to keep the channel-wise information

00035

00037     typedef typename AverageValueMap_t::const_iterator AVM_const_iterator;
00038 
00039     typedef KEY (OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE::*PMF_KEY)() const;

00053                                                       _pmf_key,
00054                                                       _pmf_value);
